TunableTuple.name: GENERATE_CLOTHING_PILE
TunableTuple.description: The tunable to generate clothing pile on the lot. This will be called when we find laundry hero objects on the lot and there is no hamper available.

Tunable.name: loot_to_apply
Tunable.description: Loot to apply for generating clothing pile.

TunableList.name: naked_outfit_category
TunableList.description: Set of outfits categories which is considered naked. When Sim switches FROM these outfits, it won't generate the pile. When Sim switches TO these outfits, it won't apply laundry reward or punishment.

TunableEnum.name: no_pile_interaction_tag
TunableEnum.description: If interaction does spin clothing change and has this tag, it will generate no clothing pile.

TunableList.name: no_pile_outfit_category
TunableList.description: Set of outfits categories which will never generate the pile. When Sim switches FROM or TO these outfits, it won't generate the pile. Laundry reward or punishment will still be applied to the Sim when switching FROM or TO these outfits.

TunableEnum.description: Tags of laundry hero objects. Placing any of these objects on the lot will cause the service to generate clothing pile for each Sims on the household after spin clothing change.

TunableTuple.name: NOT_DOING_LAUNDRY_PUNISHMENT
TunableTuple.description: If no Sim in the household unload completed laundry in specific amount of time, the negative loot will be applied to Sim household on spin clothing change to engage them doing laundry.

Tunable.name: loot_to_apply
Tunable.description: Loot defined here will be applied to the Sim in the household on spin clothing change if they are not doing laundry for a while.

Tunable.name: timeout
Tunable.description: The amount of time in Sim minutes, since the last time they're finishing laundry, before applying the loot.

TunableTuple.name: PUT_AWAY_FINISHED_LAUNDRY
TunableTuple.description: The tunable to update laundry service on Put Away finished laundry interaction.

TunableList.name: conditions_and_rewards_map
TunableList.description: Mapping of laundry conditions and loot rewards.

TunableEnum.name: interaction_tag
TunableEnum.description: Tag that represent the put away finished laundry interaction which will update Laundry Service data.

TunableTuple.name: laundry_condition_states
TunableTuple.description: This is the state type of completed laundry object condition which will aggregate the data to the laundry service.

TunableList.name: condition_states
TunableList.description: A list of state types to be stored on laundry service.

TunableList.name: excluded_states
TunableList.description: A list of state values of Condition States which will not be added to the laundry service.

Tunable.name: laundry_condition_timeout
Tunable.description: The amount of time in Sim minutes that the individual laundry finished conditions will be kept in the laundry conditions aggregate data.

TunableTuple.name: PUT_CLOTHING_PILE_ON_HAMPER
TunableTuple.description: The Tunable to directly put generated clothing pile in the hamper.

Tunable.name: chance
Tunable.description: The chance that a clothing pile will be put directly in the hamper. Tune the value in case putting clothing pile in hamper every spin-outfit-change feeling excessive.

TunableTuple.name: clothing_pile
TunableTuple.description: Clothing pile object that will be created and put into the hamper automatically. You won't see the object on the lot since it will go directly to the hamper. We create it because we need to transfer all of the commodities data and average the values into the hamper precisely.

Tunable.name: definition
Tunable.description: Reference to clothing pile object definition.

TunableList.name: initial_states
TunableList.description: A list of states to apply to the clothing pile as soon as it is created.

TunableTuple.description: The state to apply and optional to decide if the state should be applied.

TdescFragTag.name: tests
TdescFragTag.description: A list of tests groups. At least one must pass all its sub- tests to pass the TestSet. ORs of ANDs

Tunable.name: full_hamper_state
Tunable.description: The state of full hamper which make the hamper is unavailable to add new clothing pile in it.

TunableList.name: loots_to_apply
TunableList.description: Loots to apply to the hamper when clothing pile is being put.

TdescFragTag.name: tests
TdescFragTag.description: The test to run on the Sim that must pass in order for putting clothing pile automatically to the hamper. These tests will only be run when we have available hamper on the lot.
